title: IIM Bangalore Recruitment 2026 - Apply Online for Research Associate Posts
description: Indian Institute of Management Bangalore (IIM Bangalore) has released the notification for 2026. To fill up the various vacancies for Research Associate Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech, M.E/ M.Tech can use this chance and apply for the IIM Bangalore Recruitment 2026 . Here, we included the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts.
